variations.name: base
variations.label: Starter — Explore Sample Data
variations.description: Deploy COS with sample CSVs and a live shareable Helper App powered by Code Engine. One-click experience to explore files in the bucket immediately after deploy.

variations.name: cognos
variations.label: Analytics — Power BI & Cognos Ready
variations.description: Prepare your Object Storage bucket with recommended structure and metadata to accelerate BI workloads. Enables fast binding into Cognos and other analytics tooling.

variations.name: appconnect
variations.label: Integration — Data Flows & APIs
variations.description: Enable App Connect powered data flows and triggers. Automate ingestion from apps and services, and surface COS as an event source or API-driven storage layer.
